title: The iDOLM@STER
synopsis: 765 Production Studio manages the unique talents of 13 professional idols as they slowly make their way to the top and become country-wide celebrities. But the girls' journey is far from just fun and games: hard work, sweat, and tears are some of the prerequisites needed to flourish in this industryâ€”and for 765 Pro in particular, a watchful eye out for their rival, the infamous 961 Production.
